content: Click the button for the detailed instructions on how to create your own plugins.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a button label that directs users to detailed instructions on creating their own plugins. It appears as a "Read Instructions" button in a UI element, prompting users to access further guidance on plugin development.

usage.context:
className="description"
 fontSize="13px"
 fontWeight={400}
 lineHeight="20px"
 >
 {t("PluginSDKInstruction")}
 </Text>
 <Button
 className="read-instructions-button"
 label={t("Common:ReadInstructions")}
 primary

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Klikkaa' is a transliteration of 'Click'. While understandable, it's less formal and potentially jarring for some users. 'Paina painiketta' or 'Valitse painike' would be more appropriate for a professional context.
The word 'පේනු' (penu) is likely a misspelling. It probably refers to 'plugin' which would be 'ප්ලගින්' (plagin) in Sinhala when transliterated.
While technically correct, 'ඔබගේම' (obageema) is slightly less natural in this context. A more common phrasing would be 'ඔබට' (obata) or simply removing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ඔබගේම' with 'ඔබට' or omitting it entirely.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'plugins' is 'додатке'. While technically correct, 'plugins' often refers to something more specialized in a technical context. 'Додаци' is a more general term for 'add-ons'. A more accurate translation might be 'проширења' or 'додаци' depending on the specific context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'проширења' or 'додаци' instead of 'додатке' to better reflect the technical meaning of 'plugins'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure, while grammatically correct, could be improved for clarity and a more natural flow in Serbian. The literal translation makes it slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'Кликните на дугме за детаљне инструкције за прављење сопствених додатке.' or 'Кликните на дугме да бисте видели детаљне инструкције за прављење сопствених додатке.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '单击该按钮了解如何创建您自己的插件' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would be '点击此按钮，查看如何创建您自己的插件' or '点击按钮以获取创建您自己插件的详细说明。'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 点击此按钮，查看如何创建您自己的插件
